name: Wall Shooter
description:
Wall Shooter is an immersive puzzle shooter game for VR where you will solve puzzles, shoot accurately, and save the universe from an approaching wall made of colorful bricks. (Yes, sometimes universal evil takes unusual forms.)
Combine colors, use bonuses, and discover secrets on each level. Colorful and vibrant locations, dynamic music, and a board of unique rewards are included.

Welcome to the exciting world of puzzle shooter for VR!
Wall Shooter is an exhilarating and immersive VR game where you become a true hero who must save the universe from a colorful wall that is steadily approaching. (Many games have heroes saving the universe, and we want to do it too!)

Your task is to shoot colored projectiles at the bricks in order to destroy the wall and avoid colliding with it. But be careful, time is working against you, and every missed shot brings the danger closer. Only your accuracy and reaction speed can help you!

In the game you will find interesting levels with a variety of puzzles, easter eggs and secrets that you can uncover using your guns. As you progress further, the game becomes more challenging and interesting.

The game is suitable for both beginners and experienced VR users. It's fun, dynamic, and an excellent way to relax. You can choose the appropriate level of difficulty and game mode. Meditative shooting on an easy difficulty level, or a crazy race on an impossible one, completing levels and searching for secrets, or a survival mode with endless walls? It's up to you!

So, keep your guns ready, Wall Shooter, and get ready for the battle to save the universe! You'll find yourself at the center of the action and become a real hero who can defeat the danger and save the world. Just be careful and try not to scratch your belt with the wall!
